questions.question: The output voltage of a log amplifier using BJT is measured between __________ junction.

answers.a: large and small voltages are compressed equally
answers.b: large voltages are compressed more than small voltages
answers.c: large voltages are compressed less than smaller voltages

questions.question: A log amplifier has _____ in the feedback loop.

answers.d: either a diode or a BJT

questions.question: The log of a number is the _________.

answers.a: base to which the power must be raised to get that number
answers.b: power to which the base must be raised to get that number

questions.question: Which of the following functions does the antilog computation required to perform continuously with log amplifiers?
